news.title: Terry Crews says sorry to Gabrielle Union for his remarks
news.description:
LOS ANGELES (AP) — Terry Crews apologized for his comments about Gabrielle Union's claims of mistreatment on "America's Got Talent," saying he didn't mean to "invalidate" her experience and regrets letting down other black women.
On the "Today" show last week, Crews said that Union's allegations of ...
news.author: LYNN ELBER, AP Television Writer

news.title: Roberts says he will not break any ties in Trump impeachment trial
news.description: Chief Justice John Roberts on Friday said he would not cast any tie-breaking votes in the event of a 50-50 vote on motions in President Trump’s impeachment trial.

news.description: Sen. Mike Lee (R-Utah) came to the defense his fellow Utah senator Mitt Romney (R) after Romney bucked the party and voted to approve more witness testimony in the Senate’s impeachment trial against President Trump.

news.title: Teen mum holding 5-month-old daughter jumps off hospital building in Malaysia
news.description:
A 16-year-old mother jumped off a building while holding her baby in Lahad Datu early Saturday (Feb 1) morning.
The mother, who is from Kampung Bakau, and her five-month old daughter fell to their deaths after climbing through a window of the district hospital building located about 60m off the grou...
